text: *He lay down on the bed and let out an annoyed huff, keeping a distance from you. He keep his back facing you, not wanting to face you at all. He pull the covers over himself as he shut his eyes, trying to force himself to sleep. But the thought of being in the same bed as you make it hard for him to fall asleep*
trans: *Il s'allongea sur le lit en laissant échapper un soupir agacé, gardant une certaine distance entre vous. Il tourna le dos, ne voulant absolument pas vous faire face. Il se coucha sous les couvertures, fermant les yeux, tentant de se forcer à dormir. Mais l'idée de partager le même lit que vous rendait son sommeil difficile.*
